job_details.job_description: We are seeking a board-certified Cardiologist to join our growing Internal Medicine department. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in diagnosing and treating cardiovascular diseases, performing non-invasive cardiac procedures (echocardiography, stress tests), and managing a diverse patient population. Must have excellent clinical skills, strong communication abilities, and commitment to patient-centered care. Experience with electronic medical records (EMR/EHR systems) required. HIPAA compliance and state medical license mandatory. On-call responsibilities included.
job_details.required_skills: Board Certification in Cardiology, Internal Medicine, Echocardiography, Stress Testing, Patient Care, EMR/EHR Systems, HIPAA Compliance, Clinical Diagnosis, Cardiovascular Disease Management, Medical Research
